context: A comprehensive English learning course featuring multiple real-life conversation scenarios including shopping at grocery stores and cafes, family discussions, holiday planning, and various daily interactions.

dialogue.speaker: Jessica
dialogue.text: Is your English learning journey going well?

dialogue.speaker: Jessica
dialogue.text: Today we are at the grocery store with a real customer.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Yes, I'm trying to make a cake, but I'm missing a few things.

dialogue.speaker: Shop Assistant
dialogue.text: Yes, you got it rightâ€”flour!

dialogue.speaker: Shop Assistant
dialogue.text: What else are you looking for today?

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: I need butter, eggs, and sugar.

dialogue.speaker: Shop Assistant
dialogue.text: Great choice. These are all in aisle three.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Perfect! Thank you for your help.

dialogue.speaker: Shop Assistant
dialogue.text: You're welcome. Have a great day!

dialogue.speaker: Sarah
dialogue.text: I love shopping at this store.

dialogue.speaker: Max
dialogue.text: Me too, but I want to eat healthy.

dialogue.speaker: Sarah
dialogue.text: You can find healthy options here.

dialogue.speaker: Max
dialogue.text: That's great. I enjoy variety.

dialogue.speaker: Sarah
dialogue.text: Let's go to the cafe for a break.

dialogue.speaker: Barista
dialogue.text: What would you like to drink today?

dialogue.speaker: Customer 2
dialogue.text: I'll have a cappuccino, please.

dialogue.speaker: Barista
dialogue.text: Would you like that hot or iced?

dialogue.speaker: Customer 2
dialogue.text: Hot, please. And make it a large one.

dialogue.speaker: Barista
dialogue.text: One large hot cappuccino coming right up.

dialogue.speaker: Customer 3
dialogue.text: Can I get a smoothie instead?

dialogue.speaker: Barista
dialogue.text: Of course. What flavor would you like?

dialogue.speaker: Customer 3
dialogue.text: Strawberry, please.

dialogue.speaker: Friend 1
dialogue.text: Happy New Year! What are your goals this year?

dialogue.speaker: Laura
dialogue.text: I want to learn to cook better.

dialogue.speaker: Friend 1
dialogue.text: That's wonderful! I'm planning to travel more.

dialogue.speaker: Laura
dialogue.text: Where do you want to go?

dialogue.speaker: Friend 1
dialogue.text: I want to visit Europe and Asia.

dialogue.speaker: Emily
dialogue.text: I'm getting very excited about Christmas.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Me too! What are you planning to do?

dialogue.speaker: Emily
dialogue.text: We're preparing a big dinner for the family.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: That sounds wonderful. I'm looking forward to celebrating with my family too.

dialogue.speaker: Emily
dialogue.text: Let's celebrate together this year!

quality_issues: Random noun blanking instead of pedagogically valuable items
No alternatives provided for any blanks
No IELTS insights or deep dive explanations
Low coverage of high-value verbs and expressions
